text:
학생 여러분들께서 응답해주시는 결과는 교수님들께서 당해의 수업 운영과 개선에 주요한 자료로 활용하십니다.
수업의 운영과 개선을 위해 학생 여러분들께서는 번거로우시더라도 강의평가에 참여해주실 것을 부탁드리겠습니다.
응답에 따른 익명성은 철저하게 보장되오니 안심하시고 참여해주시기 바랍니다.
감사합니다.
1. 설문 종료일: ~11. 4. (월)
2. 설문 경로: 학사포탈시스템에 접속(http://portal.yonsei.ac.kr/main/index.jsp) ⇒ 학사정보시스템 ⇒ “학사행정” - ‘수업’탭 클릭 ⇒ ‘강의평가실시’ 클릭 ⇒ 각 수업별 ‘평가’ 버튼 클릭 후 설문 진행
* 본 문자는 연세대학교(신촌,국제캠퍼스) 학부 재학생 대상으로 발송된 문자입니다. (10월 20일 기준)
** 기존에 이미 강의평가를 진행해주신 학생분들께도 문자가 발송된 점 양해 부탁드립니다.
교무처 학사지원팀 드림
[Yonsei University, 2024-2 Course Survey]
2024-2 semester's course mid-survey is in progress.
The results of students' responses are used by professors as key data for operating and improving classes for the semester.
In order to operate and improve classes, we politely ask that students participate in course survey.
The anonymity of your responses is strictly guaranteed, so please go on the course survey without any worry.
1. Deadline for the course survey: ~11. 4. (Mon.)
2. How to participate: Go to Yonsei Portal Services(http://portal.yonsei.ac.kr/main/index.jsp) ⇒ Log-in(Input ID, Password) ⇒ Academic Information System ⇒ Click on ‘Courses’ ⇒ Click on ‘Course Evaluation’ ⇒ Press the ‘Survey’ button for each course
trans:
The feedback provided by students is used by professors as key data for managing and improving the course.
To help operate and improve the course, we ask students to participate in the lecture evaluation, even if it may be inconvenient.
Your anonymity in the responses is fully guaranteed, so please feel free to participate with confidence.
Thank you.
1. Survey deadline: Monday, November 4.
2. Survey access: Go to the academic portal system (http://portal.yonsei.ac.kr/main/index.jsp) ⇒ Select "Academic Information System" ⇒ Click "Academic Administration" ⇒ Click the "Class" tab, then click "Lecture Evaluation" ⇒ Click the "Evaluate" button for each class and complete the survey.
* This message was sent to undergraduate students at Yonsei University (Sinchon, International Campus) as of October 20.
** Please note that text messages have also been sent to students who have already completed the lecture evaluation.
Academic Support Team, Office of Academic Affairs
[Yonsei University, 2024-2 Course Survey]
2024-2 semester's course mid-survey is in progress.
The results of students' responses are used by professors as key data for operating and improving classes for the semester.
In order to operate and improve classes, we politely ask that students participate in course survey.
The anonymity of your responses is strictly guaranteed, so please go on the course survey without any worry.
1. Deadline for the course survey: ~11. 4. (Mon.)
2. How to participate: Go to Yonsei Portal Services(http://portal.yonsei.ac.kr/main/index.jsp) ⇒ Log-in(Input ID, Password) ⇒ Academic Information System ⇒ Click on ‘Courses’ ⇒ Click on ‘Course Evaluation’ ⇒ Press the ‘Survey’ button for each course
